meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound, CO(NH2)2, that is the chief nitrogenous waste excreted in the urine of mammals and some fish.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of ureas in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: Ureas are important components of urine in animals.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistakenly thought the ureas were sugar and tried to taste them.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the purity of ureas, essential yet often overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The smell of ureas in the air reminded her of biology class.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of organic compounds derived from urea, used in resins, plastics, and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The company specialized in producing ureas for various industries.
meanings.sent2: Ureas play a crucial role in the manufacturing of plastics.
meanings.sent3: The artist used ureas in an unconventional way to create his masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas flowed like ureas, shaping the future of the company.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of new uses for ureas revolutionized the pharmaceutical field.
